V.iv.1.B.5.a
.
SMC Codes
VBMS-R captures the required SMC coding for
Codesheet
entry based on data entered on the SMC CODES tab.
Reference
:  For more information on entering SMC codes, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, 4.A
the
VBMS-R User Guide
, and
the
SMC Calculator User Guide
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B - Codesheet Section
citation: Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B
